name: Relationship of annual payment to rental and income
text: [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The amount of the annual payment with respect to any dwelling unit shall not exceed the amount by which the fair market rental for that unit exceeds thirty per cent of the tenant's income as determined by the administration pursuant to procedures and regulations established by it. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2000, c 214, §5; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
